decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( 899 PL100 (Location Plan), 899 PL01 (Proposed Plan), 899 PL03, 899 PL100 (Proposed Block Plan), 899 PL05 (Proposed Plans), 899 PL06 (Proposed South West and North West Elevation), 899 PL01 (Existing Plans), Design and Access Statement received on the 15.04.2014. ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - Notwithstanding the approved plans, any future windows to the existing angled roofslope at ground floor level (above existing ground floor bedroom shown on plan number 899 PL 05) shall not open more than 150mm in height and all glazing should be fully obscured.
description: Erection of two storey rear extension, internal alterations and removal of garage roof  to residential element at rear of property.
